original_text: Thou hast been in Eden the garden of God; every precious stone was thy covering, the sardius, topaz, and the diamond, the beryl, the onyx, and the jasper, the sapphire, the emerald, and the carbuncle, and gold: the workmanship of thy tabrets and of thy pipes was prepared in thee in the day that thou wast created.
korean_text: 네가 옛적에 하나님의 동산 에덴에 있어서 각종 보석 곧 홍보석과 황보석과 금강석과 황옥과 홍마노와 창옥과 청보석과 남보석과 홍옥과 황금으로 단장하였음이여 네가 지음을 받던 날에 너를 위하여 소고와 비파가 준비되었도다

sentences.original_text: every precious stone was thy covering
the sardius, topaz, and the diamond
the beryl, the onyx, and the jasper
the sapphire, the emerald, and the carbuncle
sentences.korean_translation: 蓝宝石，绿宝石和红玉髓

sentences.original_text: the workmanship of thy tabrets and of thy pipes
in the day that thou wast created
